이집트의 신 할인팩 (남성)

Egyptian God Value Pack
kDesc
Six gods are better than one. Includes Amun, Anubis, Horus, Atum, Sobek and Ra Heads plus God Top and Bottom for a total of 8 pieces! [#Legal]
Six dieux valent mieux qu'un. Ce pack de 8 accessoires contient les têtes d'Amon, Anubis, Horus, Atoum, Sobek et Ra, ainsi qu'un haut et un bas divins. [#Legal]
Sechs Götter sind besser als einer. Enthält: Köpfe von Amun, Anubis, Horus, Atum, Sobek und Ra sowie Götter-Ober- und Unterteil. Ein achtteiliges Set also! [#Legal]
Sei dei sono meglio di uno. Include le teste di Amun, Anubi, Horus, Atum, Sobek e Ra, più torace e gonna da divinità per un totale di 8 pezzi! [#Legal]
Seis dioses son mejor que uno. Incluye cabezas de Amón, Anubis, Horus, Atón, Sobek y Ra, además de ropa de arriba y abajo, ¡un total de 8 piezas! [#Legal]
Six gods are better than one. Includes Amun, Anubis, Horus, Atum, Sobek and Ra Heads plus God Top and Bottom for a total of 8 pieces! [#Legal]
여섯 명의 신들은 하나보다 낫습니다. 아문, 아누비스, 호루스, 아툼, 소벡, 그리고 라의 머리와 신의 상의와 하의를 포함합니다.[#Legal]
Six gods are better than one. Includes Amun, Anubis, Horus, Atum, Sobek and Ra Heads plus God Top and Bottom for a total of 8 pieces! [#Legal]
六位神總比一位好。套裝包括八件道具：太陽神阿蒙、死神阿努比斯、法老王的守護神荷魯斯神、創世神阿圖姆、索貝克鱷魚神及太陽神拉的頭套、上衣及下身服裝。 [#Legal]
六位神總比一位好。套裝包括八件道具：太陽神阿蒙、死神阿努比斯、法老王的守護神荷魯斯神、創世神阿圖姆、索貝克鱷魚神及太陽神拉的頭套、上衣及下半身服裝。 [#Legal]
Six gods are better than one. Includes Amun, Anubis, Horus, Atum, Sobek and Ra Heads plus God Top and Bottom for a total of 8 pieces! [#Legal]
